# PIXORA Portfolio - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Premium dark-themed 3D portfolio website for PIXORA Graphic Designing - AI-powered marketing and brand identity agency.

## Tech Stack
- React 18+ with Vite + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Three.js + React Three Fiber for 3D graphics
- Framer Motion + GSAP for animations
- Particle effects and glassmorphism design

## Design System
- Primary Color: Deep Black (#000000)
- Accent: Electric Purple (#8B00FF, #6B00FF)
- Highlight: Neon Purple (#B026FF)
- Text: White with purple gradients
- Style: Dark, futuristic, cyberpunk aesthetic
